languages.text: "Это было слишком милосердным наказанием. Оно не станет уроком. Я разочарована твоей поспешностью, {name}".
"That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Это было слишком милосердным наказанием. Оно не станет уроком. Я разочарована твоей поспешностью, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "That was too lenient of a punishment. It will teach no lesson. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That was too lenient of a punishment. It will teach no lesson. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That was too lenient of a punishment. It will teach no lesson. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That was too lenient of a punishment. It will teach no lesson. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “这样的惩罚太仁慈了，没有任何惩戒意义，也无法杀一儆百。你的鲁莽让我很是失望，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “这样的惩罚太仁慈了，没有任何惩戒意义。你的鲁莽让我很是失望，{name}。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「罰としては甘すぎる。他の者に対しる見せしめにすらならない。{name}、お前の軽率さには失望した」
languages.original_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「罰としては甘すぎる。他の者に対しる見せしめにすらならない。{name}、お前の軽率さには失望した」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Ese ha sido un castigo demasiado indulgente. No servirá de lección para nadie. Su impetuosidad me decepciona, {name}».
languages.original_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Ese ha sido un castigo demasiado indulgente. No enseñará ninguna lección. Su impetuosidad me decepciona, {name}».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Das war eine zu milde Strafe. Sie wird anderen nicht als Lektion dienen. Eure Impulsivität enttäuscht mich, {name}."
languages.original_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Das war eine zu milde Strafe. Sie wird nicht als Lektion dienen. Eure Impulsivität enttäuscht mich, {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Voilà un châtiment bien trop clément qui n'enseigne aucune leçon. Votre impétuosité me déçoit, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà châtiment bien trop clément qui n'enseigne aucune leçon. Votre impétuosité me déçoit, {name}. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Bu ceza, fazlasıyla hafif kaldı. Diğerleri için ders vazifesi görmeyecek. Fevriliğin beni hayal kırıklığına uğratıyor {name}."
languages.original_text: "That was too lenient a punishment. It will not serve as a lesson to others. Your impetuousness disappoints me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Bu fazlasıyla hafif bir cezaydı. Diğerleri için bir ders vazifesi görmeyecek. Fevriliğin beni hayal kırıklığına uğratıyor {name}."
traits.speaker: Chorda
